title: Enhancing Programming Practical Competencies: IDLF-M for Object-Oriented Programming Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Using multimedia materials (videos, animations, documents) provided by the Moodle LMS platform, learners can explain and apply the four principles of object-oriented programming (encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, abstraction) to practical tasks
Through IDLF framework-based activities (quizzes, assignments, simulations), learners can perform the entire project process from class diagram design to system analysis using UML
In a VR-based coding simulation environment, learners can develop OOP solutions tailored to real-world scenarios by practicing inheritance and interface implementation
Through project-based assessments combining peer and self-evaluation, learners can improve OOP design quality and apply it to real work environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
